ingredients.ingredient: 3 large jalapeno peppers, seeded and cut into slivers
10 slices thick sliced bacon, cut in half

cookingTips: Soak toothpicks in water for at least 30 minutes before use to prevent charring in the oven
Butterfly shrimp carefully to create a pocket for the feta and jalapeño filling
Wrap bacon snugly around each shrimp and secure with toothpick to keep filling from escaping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These elegant bites combine salty feta, spicy jalapeño, and smoky bacon with tender shrimp. What temperature would you broil or bake to ensure crispy bacon and cooked shrimp?
